channel.title: comic on daiyi
channel.description: Recent content in comic on daiyi

item.title: slice of life comics
item.description: a potpourri of lifetimes, art styles, and odd encounters, previously serialised for close friends and roommates. home comics My family deserves a storyline of its own. A typical sampler of home visit interactions. I helped my mama set up her first social profile when I was home for winter break one year. Fast-forward to today and she is engaging in youtube video comment flame wars with strangers on the internet.

item.title: galaxy tripping
item.description: The story of three friends as they make a road trip across the galaxy in their avocado spaceship. I drew this comic as a part of Inktober 2014 \o/ The first four pages are here.
